divs: sighting detailsi was outside in my front yard, i don't know how to explain this but i was sitting on my couch and felt compelled to go outside and look at the sky. after a few minutes of looking up, all of a sudden appeared a blue spherical energy form, it would move around in circles, disappear and instantaneously appear elsewhere and repeat the same motion, for about a minute and a half until just vanishing. my feeling was amazement. later on that night i lost time i think 20-30 minutes, i mean i was wide awake and then i was foggy but awake elsewhere no in between. i have no recollection of what happened in this lapse.. i should note there was another individual in the neighborhood whom also saw this(this individual wishes to remain anonymous). i was telepathically\empathically communicated with. i would also like to note that within seconds of this object disappearing there were helicopters, though being that i am less than .25 miles away from otis air force base this may have been coincidence(i don't think so though) i hope this information helps some, peace be with you
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sandwich
There were no other sightings in Sandwich on or around June 20th 2008
